elements.name: question1
elements.title: Using an example from your family and friends, think about how you have reacted in an argument. Describe the situation and your reaction.
choices: Escape: I fled the situation and didn't want to expose myself to the conflict.
Fight: I got loud or even aggressive to get my point across.
Giving in: I didn't want to argue and accepted the other person's opinion.
Delegation: I have involved a third person in the dispute so that they can resolve the conflict.
Compromise: I discussed with my counterpart and put forward arguments for my opinion. Then the other person put forward their arguments and we found a compromise together.
Agreement: After both sides have put forward their arguments, the strongest argument has won and we have ended our dispute.
